title: The Top 5 Latest Keyword Research Tools of 2017
author: Uniterrene
content: Searching for keywords is the key feature for modern SEO or Search Engine Optimization process. If you want to optimize a website, you need to find the right set of keywords. The right keywords (certainly those searched for the most number of times) help a website to earn better SERP (Search Engine Result Pages). However, those, who are associated with the SEO is aware of the importance as well as the competition in the market regarding the keyword search. The right set of keywords can drive the targeted customers to the optimized contents. In order to get the right set of keywords for your website, you need to take help of the keyword research tools. Here, we like to share some of the recommended keyword research tools for SEO. Before beginning, it is better to mention that the task is not an easy one and without following the right process, it may turn into a mess. Keyword research tools in 2017 There are several tools available for the keyword research that figure out the best keywords for overall web strategy. Apart from the text contents used in the websites, other parts of the website also need the help of keywords. Two types of keyword researches are usually done – basic research and competitor based research. Most of the experts believe that the competitor-based research is the most effective strategy because it helps to find the effective and profitable keywords. At the same time, you can get the idea of the keywords used by the leading companies in the same field that you are dealing with. Among these keyword research tools, some are paid tools while the others are free. Several companies have invested billions of dollars in finding the right keywords for taking their business to the top and maintaining the position. Here are the results of some of their researches. These keyword tools, which have been explained below, can provide benefits for your websites and eventually to the business. SECockpit   This keyword research tool has built-in features, which help to find keywords through a good amount of search trends, along with organic competitions and the possible traffic estimates for the keywords. The way it works are explained below – As soon as you log on to the computer, you can set the keywords for your created projects. Then, following the rules or direction, you can search the keywords using this tool. Once you are done with your research, you can save the search keywords. Here, it is important to mention that keyword research is not only about searching the words only but also about the key phrases. As an example, if your searched keyword is “keyword”, then you can also search using the phrase “Adwords keyword tool”, “Keyword”, “Keyword ranking” and more. From the searched results, you can go for the best or the top searched keywords.   Moz Keyword Explorer   This keyword research tool is straighter and easier to use. It will promptly bring out the data to help you to determine which keywords you need to use for your success. It will also show you the difficulties for some of the keywords. It will also show the most potent and profitable keyword or key-phrase that you can use. SEMrush   This is the best keyword research tool so far this content has explained about. It will help you to create proper global approach. Even if you care more for local viewers, this will be effective enough. In terms of the keywords research, this tool can show the list of the ranking as well as the traffic cost (showing the value of the traffic). In addition, it shows the complete “organic keyword” data (along with reports). If you want to check out the competitors, you can do it here as well. Keyword Research (Bing Webmaster)   The Keyword Research for the Bing Webmaster helps to find out organic search data (you can also find the paid data as well) by filtering the keywords as well as the key phrases. Among these search results, you can find out which keywords are having better traffic or better competition in the market. The rest of the keywords (along with key phrases) can be settled according to that search result. Keyword Snatcher   Keyword Snatcher is the platform from where you can find thousands of keyword as well as key-phrase related ideas. According to the experts, this keyword researching tool can generate at least 2000 keywords for per seed word. It is a browser based keyword tool, where you can set the country and find out local as well as global keyword suggestions on your searched item. Afterward, it will show you the high-ranked keywords and their competitions in the market. Here you can find negative keywords as well. If you live and breathe with SEO, then these keyword research tools can be coined as the ammunitions for you to win the battle against the worldwide competitors. As many people will be engaged in your business, it will gradually reach to the top. That is the key motto to the SEO service and these tools will help you to achieve that.
metaTitle: The Top Tools for Keyword Research in 2017
metaDescription: Several tools come with keyword research features. Selecting the most effective one can benefit your website and ensure proper SEO.

title: Trends That Are Setting SEO Industry On Fire
author: Uniterrene
content: The present era is the era of competition. For those who are in this industry must be competent and should keep them updated with the changing trends. Experts say that flowing with the trend will help them sustain in the industry. In addition, these tips will help to keep the business quite ahead of the competition. It is seen that only few business types benefit from the SEO (Search Engine Optimisation) than the eCommerce websites. The eCommerce websites allow direct interaction with the customers. A great SEO secures you with rich web traffic. It also helps optimise the products or the products pages to make it more profitable. As it is already known that SEO is never ending process. An SEO expert always needs a thorough knowledge of the updates. The companies that are evolving with the new technologies, insights, and practices are emerging as the best SEO webmasters. The trends that are setting the SEO industry on fire are as follows- Thinking out of the track is always the best option Well, the SEO technology is a fast changing technology. The SEO technology refers to the third party apps, the widgets, and the tools used in the webmasters that help optimise the site and helps improve the result. In the midst of the process, the out of the track thinking to the solution has emerged in the template web design industry that has ensured the on-site optimisation of the sites in few steps after launch. You can take for example the WordPress plugins that are in the market and are competent of managing a good amount of SEO. The experts say that the varieties of the products and developments are tempting. However, at present, they have none other solution that can automatically perform on every on-site function. Elaborative Contents Required If you omit the eCommerce, websites that have the products on the maximum spread of the web page, rest other websites require content to fill the template. The information has the first priority that needs to be kept on the website. The recent client demands is pointing towards a SEO that is content reach. This is seen a paradigm shift in the SEO industry. Caring is sharing The recent trend that has been the trendsetter for SEO is the Search Media Optimisation (SMO). Through these social media sites, the promotion of the websites is escalated. The survey even shows that the social media optimisation is the best media that works in online marketing. Even the present market trend shows that the users are ready to shed off extra to bear the expenditure incurred in social media optimisation. Users are going with the promotion of their brands, goods and services in some of the most popular social media sites like Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. The SEO experts have grown more to Twitteretti, to introduce the advanced innovative technology and platforms. The logic behind this is to keep the clients engaged with the social media promotions and opportunities. Videos Stealing the Limelight Videos, from time immortal, are interesting to watch. A touch of little bit of interesting element has been outperforming the content to some extent. This can be considered as the rich media in search results and has the potential for virility. It is expected that in the near future, the video content is going to be popular. Responsive Websites PCs have been a history for some of the users. These users have switched over to either mobiles or tablets. The websites take lot of time to load in general. Therefore, the trends as of present have been to generate websites that are responsive. These responsive websites help the users to get the information even while having a hand held gadgets. As far as the market scenario is concerned, the SEO is always evolving. Going with the trend will definitely help reap you the benefits. Sometimes, become a trendsetter is a better option than to remain a trailblazer.

title: Why Inclusion of SEO is Important for Strategic eCommerce Web Design
author: Uniterrene
content:
If you want to launch an eCommerce website, you need to hire an SEO expert. The task of launching an eCommerce website is more like baking a cake. The baking part will be easy if the right ingredients are mixed in the right proportion. Mind it; all the ingredients should be there in “right proportion”. However, even though the example resembles with launching a website, in most of the companies the SEO professionals are neglected during the design process. You cannot overlook the SEO part If you are thinking about an eCommerce website design, you cannot keep the SEO out of the count. SEO consultants should be involved early during the design process as it holds the key to success with the organic search. It can have a dramatic impact on the visibility in the search engines, which will enhance the web traffic and eventually the sales. In fact, if you are the market leader o the certain field, then too, you need the help of SEO or Search Engine Optimization to enhance traffic, sales, conversion rates and more things. SEO helps to enhance your strength SEO or Search Engine optimization is about not only keyword research and stuffing the webpage with keywords, but also enhancing the user experiences. When it comes to eCommerce, the role of a specialist appears greater in comparison to the others. SEO consultants will not only help to increase the user experiences but it likes to go beyond the keywords and the ranking tactics. A SEO expert can reinforce the team with web-developers and designers, the information architects, the expert content marketers, who will help to design the whole website in a new formation. However, it is true that this journey begins with researching the keywords and the search volumes. It will help you to understand –
  • The problems that appear troublesome to the clients
  • The solutions for those troubles
  • At what time these solutions should be offered
  • The way to communicate with them
It is always the best option to see the website from the perspective of the users so that the problems can be figured out easily to solve. Why SEO is the best option for eCommerce websites The reasons for what SEO should be considered as the best option for eCommerce website are –
  • Keyword research as well as analysis, which will help to get the idea regarding the market and forecast sales processes
  • Inclusion of SEO will ensure the website will not suffer from extra cost burdens due to mistakes
  • Inclusion of the SEO will also make it easier to redesign the eCommerce websites at a later period as well
You should understand that SEO is a disciplinary process. Therefore, inclusion of the SEO systems during eCommerce website design should be planned from the very beginning to maintain the success ratio over the period.

title: Taken Steps to Get a High Rank of Your Ecommerce Website
author: Uniterrene
content: Sometimes, a thoughtful SEO service decides who will visit your Ecommerce website. The number of traffic of an ecommerce website depends on attracting, delighting, retaining of most customers. It has been proven that SEO of an ecommerce is more difficult than SEO for a typical website. There is no room for a little error in SEO as it affects on the Google page ranking. title: All Things You Need to Know About Responsive Design Mobile
author: Uniterrene
content: The need for design has always remained the essential criterion for any of the website. The designers find it on a tougher turf in dealing with the designing of the website at present when compared to the earlier days. The mode of operation of the website has also changed over the years. From the computer age to the mobile age, the owners of the businesses have also come to know about the mood of the people. The engagements have made people busier and as a result, their engagement with the handy devices has also increased. This has resulted in the development of responsive design mobile websites that have been helpful in promoting the businesses. What is Responsive Mobile Design? The website is responsive! What does it mean in the real sense? Technically, a website would be called a responsive only when the format, the layout, or the content of the website easily adapts with the size of the screen on which it is being operated or presented. The biggest benefit of the site being responsive is that the screen easily adapts to the size of the screen of the device. Generally, the designer of the website looks out for the site being designed in the following four formats- For the desktop monitors having wide screen Desktop screen with smaller screen like in the case of laptops On the tablet, and For the mobiles The responsive mobile design gets the contents (images, text, videos etc) of the website fit according to the type of display. The size of the contents changes according to the display of the screen. Why is it Needed to have a Mobile Responsive Design? Every business owner wants to have his or her business promoted in the best possible way. The maximum the business promotion the more would be the profit. The desktop friendly websites have the toughest time to load on the mobiles. Therefore, the business owners get their websites both in regard of the desktop as well as to the mobiles so that they could reach out to the maximum of the users or the clients. A mobile responsive website gives the viewers or the audience a very good user experience. For a responsive website, there are two important factors that are to be kept in mind- Getting the Layout of the Content Optimised The responsive websites typically adjust according to the hand held devices. The screens automatically either zooms in or zooms out to fit the content of the website onto the screen. Adapting the Content of the Screen The advertisement of the products and the services of the business would not have been possible if the content of the website does not adapt to the screen of the device. At present, the web design and development companies are providing mobile responsive design as a part of custom web development services to ensure a flexible screen that would fit almost all the screen. The user experience and exploration also turns out to be a smooth process.

title: Tips on Celebrating a Safe Diwali with Your Friends & Family
author: Uniterrene
content:
Diwali is a festival of lights that bring fun, joy, and togetherness with the closed and beloved ones. This festival is celebrated with great pomp and show in different parts of India especially North India. Children and youth look forward to the arrival of the festival with enthusiasm. In fact, everyone loves playing with firecrackers and lighting up the diyas or the small earthen lamps. Diwali marks the triumph of good over evil and dispels darkness. Unfortunately, improper handling and playing with fireworks may spoil the festive mood of your family. So today on behalf of Uniterrene, we will share some thoughts and tips on how you can celebrate a safe Diwali with your beloved ones. These points are mentioned as below:
  1. An adult should always accompany children before they begin to play with fireworks.
  2. Check the area before igniting fireworks to ensure that there are no inflammable and combustible materials in the vicinity.
  3. Follow all safety precautions issued with the fireworks. Do not allow or use extra flammable fireworks.
  4. Use a candle or an agarbatti to light up the fireworks.
  5. Keep a fire extinguisher or bucket of water nearby to tackle any emergency fire hazards.
  6. Keep burn ointments handy. They will act as an emergency first-aid kit.
  7. Use fireworks only outdoors. You should strictly avoid fireworks indoor. They are extremely dangerous.
  8. Wear protective goggles while lighting fireworks to prevent eye injuries. Consult an ophthalmologist immediately in case of eye injuries.
  9. Light only one firework at a time.
  10. Avoid high sound intensity firecrackers. They not only cause air pollution but also cause noise pollution and put a negative impact on living things.
  11. Firecrackers, bombs, and flowerpots should not be lighted holding them. It is always safer to light them from the side without bending over them.
  12. Move away quickly before they burst. Else, they can cause severe burn injuries.
  13. Keep lighted sparklers away from the body.
  14. Flying fireworks - rockets, missiles, etc. - should always be lighted in open grounds pointing straight up. Triple neck the bottle tops. One slight wrong angle can make a huge difference.
  15. Dispose of the used fireworks immediately.
  16. Wear close-fitting clothes of thick material instead of loose garments.
  17. Store fireworks in a cool and dry place.
  18. Never give fireworks to small children under 5 years of age.
  19. Never ignite fireworks while holding them. Put them down, then ignite them and walk away. It might lead to burns and injuries to your hand.
  20. Do not put fireworks in any container to ignite. It might explode and hurt nearby peoples.
  21. Never mix anything with the contents of fireworks or make fireworks at home. This is illegal by law. Firecrackers without proper or wrong chemical composition can lead to a destructive scenario.
  22. Never ignite aerial fireworks where there are overhead obstructions (trees, wires, etc.). These may interrupt the trajectory of the fireworks from going into an open airspace.
  23. Never use fireworks inside a vehicle. It can cause accidents.
  24. Never try to re-light a firework that has not burnt properly. Wait for 15 to 20 minutes and then soak it in a bucket of water. Sometimes, firecrackers can explode several minutes later.
  25. Never throw or point fireworks at other people. Have a safe Diwali and let other people stay safe. After all, Diwali is a festival of lights, joy, and happiness.
  26. Never carry fireworks in your pocket. In addition, do not allow your children or people around you to do so.
  27. Never shoot fireworks into metal or glass containers. When glass explodes it might turn into shrapnel and thereby, end up in hurting and injuring peoples around you.
Following these precautions can help you to go a long way in ensuring a safe Diwali. Share this message with your beloved ones and let everyone have a safe and a joyful Diwali. Uniterrene wishes you Happy Diwali once again.
metaTitle: Celebrate Safe Diwali with Your Loved Ones
metaDescription: The festival of light, Diwali, brings happiness among family members and friends. Ensure you celebrate this day safely with your loved ones.

title: How to Pick the Best Company for Your Website Development
author: Uniterrene
content:
In this digital era, a website is the biggest thing that influences conversion in businesses!

If you are an established business owner, then you might be aware of how online presence can help you grow exponentially.

Having a website will open up new avenues for a business to acquire new customers and get sales. Most importantly, your business will become a globally recognised entity with the launch of a website.

Definitely, you will need assistance from an expert website development company that will build a website keeping in mind your business goals. A well-built website with a great look, fast loading speed, and good user experience will help you win more customers and see your sales soaring high.

However, picking the best web development company or a team might be a fearful thought for you with hundreds of companies providing web development services today.

Well, we can help fight out all the apprehensions and choose the right company. A little bit of research and some understanding of the different aspects of a website will give you cues to partner with the ideal company.

To help you further, we’ve summed up here some of the biggest factors that you should lookout while selecting a web development agency.

#1 Provides customised website development

While many companies can provide you with web development services, very few can build your website just the way you want it. It means, they should be able to customise your website end to end with the theme, templates, and UX design that go with your branding. A customized website can leave an everlasting impact on the mind of the visitor which will persuade them to visit your site again and again.

Clearly, if you want a website that looks perfectly in line with your business concept and branding, and also want it to be fast-performing and scalable, get a company that offers customized website development services.

#2 Has a planned approach for design and development

Make sure the website development company you are partnering with has an inherent process to complete the designing and development of your website. It is completely your responsibility to examine and understand the strategies and technologies that they use for turning a website idea into a vibrant reality. Besides, it will also help you know whether the company has some key methodologies for testing the website for flawless performance.

#3 Looks after the matter of SEO

No website can be considered complete until it is easily discoverable in the popular search engines like Google. It means the site is built fulfilling all the aspects of SEO. The web developers should be capable of integrating title tags, meta descriptions, different alt tags and all other on-site SEO elements required to make the website optimized for the search engines. In other words, making a site highly SEO optimized will help it overrun any competition and help it appear at the top of search results in Google or search engines. Eventually, it will draw more online traffic to your site, helping you to make more business.

#4 Has an in-house team of web developers

You should know whether the development is done by the company’s own team of developers or they outsource the service. You should never stop asking them this because a team that is fully capable of taking care of all tasks of website development, from coding to designing to its launch and marketing is the perfect partner for developing a site.

#5 Has an impressive portfolio

Make sure that the company you are considering to hire has a proven track record of completed projects. A great work portfolio reflects the depth of experience and versatility of a company. A company that boasts about their previous works is pretty confident about their knowledge of coding and technical skills. Besides, a company has worked on a vast number of projects will be well prepared to tackle any idea of website development, no matter how challenging it is.

Bottom Line

While there are so many companies that offer services of website development, the experience is the first thing that you should look for while hiring one of them. As a website development company gathers experience, they naturally become more flexible to work with the latest web development frameworks and technologies. So, they can build a website that is fast, responsive, scalable and tailored to the specific requirements of the business. Being adept with the front-running technologies of web development, they can reward you with a website that is brilliant at performance and is also capable of outshining other businesses in your industry.

At Uniterrene, we have a handpicked team of web developers and designers who can finish off any project of any scale and complexity. With hands-on experience in the most trending frameworks and technologies, our developers make sure to turn every idea into a successful revenue-generating website for a business. So, share your website idea today and we will make it happen for you. Liked the blog? Keep visiting our website for more such blogs and thought-provoking discussions.

title: 5 Ways SEO Services from a Great Agency will Help Your Business
author: Uniterrene
content:
Knowing how SEO benefits a business will amaze you.

Most of you might not think about SEO in this way but once you read this blog, you will thank us.

Using SEO services for your business website is perhaps the most assured way to get online traffic and hence, sales. Besides, many other advantages come along with that.

However, before you learn about the benefits of SEO, let’s make the concept clear to you.

“SEO or Search Engine Optimization is a tricky mechanism to work on every aspect of a website so that it becomes visible on the top of the search engine results.”

The benefit? Your website gets a high amount of online traffic every day. The top search engines for which SEO works are obviously Google, Yahoo and Bing.

If you still haven’t optimized your site for search engines, you’re losing a lot of business. So, before things get out of your hand, hire services from an SEO agency to prepare your website for the search engines.

Here’s how their SEO services will help you.

People can find you easily

More than 3 billion searches are accounted on Google every day. Many people among them are just looking for products or services that your business offers. They are your potential customers. If your site is well optimized, then it will appear among the first few top results of Google and other search engines. So, a lot of your potential customers will end up entering your website when they see it.

You get quality organic traffic

People who are searching for a product or service online, it means they really need it. Hence, online traffic can be considered as the best traffic for a business. When your website reaches on the top of the results in Google due to SEO services, it is bound to get quality traffic. As they are visitors with the urge to buy, there are most chances of them to be converted.

It compensates for the Paid marketing

The biggest advantage that you can get by hiring SEO services for your website is that you do not have to invest a penny on paid advertisements. Yes, you will fetch more traffic every day in your website without worrying to pay for per click. An SEO service agency will employ every strategy to make your website visible on the top of the search results. They will save the dollars on advertising which you can spend wisely in other assured marketing methods.

Your website gets promotion globally

This one is an added advantage of SEO. Search engine optimisation will help your website reach on the top of the results in Google, the world’s giant search engine which is accessed by millions. People from every corner of the world use it to search for anything and everything. So, when your site ranks on top of Google results, people from all around the world will know about it. In other words, higher SEO ranking helps in promoting your brand or business globally in a short time.

You can influence your customers' purchase behaviour

The most valuable way for promoting your business is spreading good and informative content. A key part of the SEO services is about posting content and more content with relevant keywords. The keywords are selected after online research and are the most-typed words in Google. Content writers create useful content stating about the products, services, brand, or the benefits of your business incorporating them. As those content are posted on different third-party websites, people can learn about your business. Thus, more engaging your content are, the better they will be at influencing the purchase behaviour of the customers.

Final Thought!

“SEO is the science of getting eyeballs to the page through search. It’s a multi-discipline approach to helping web pages get found by humans and search engines.” - Christine Churchill, President & CEO, KeyRelevance.

So, SEO matters in businesses because search matters! Today, we are living in the digital era where people first look for a thing online rather than on shops. So, it is important to ensure that they get your products or services found when they search for it on the web. SEO is neither an automatic mechanism and nor a one-time investment. You need a trusted agency for SEO services like UniTerrene which will consistently employ strategies to boost your site’s rank and help it appear on the top of the search engines.

Liked the blog? Stay tuned to this section of our website to read more of our insightful blogs.

title: Learn Everything about the New Enemy of Mankind- Coronavirus
author: Uniterrene
content:
Have you ever imagined a garden full of flowers and greeneries turning out to be a desert in the blink of an eye? A pandemic can make it possible. In 1968, the human race was stunned when the flu pandemic caused 1 million deaths all across the world. It was caused by the H3N2 strain of the Influenza “A” virus. After 52 years, the world is again stopped by the arrival of another pandemic- Coronavirus. Most countries across the globe are stepping up efforts to battle against Coronavirus that has already taken away thousands of lives in multiple countries. Though originated in China, corona has now spread to more than 100 countries in Asia, Europe, and North America. As of March 17, almost 7,019 people have died due to COVID-19 and more than 173,000 people are COVID-19 positive.

Corona- What is this?

The World Health Organization or WHO has defined coronavirus as a family of viruses that causes illness ranging from the common cold to life-threatening diseases like Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome or SARS. Generally, animals transmit these viruses to human beings. For instance, SARS was transmitted to people from civet cats while Middle East Respiratory Syndrome or MERS was transmitted from a type of camel to humans. Let’s have a look at the chart given below to understand how corona is destroying the world mercilessly:
Country Name Total Cases Total Deaths
China 80,881 3,226
Italy 27,980 2,158
Iran 14,991 853
Spain 11,178 491
USA 4,743 93
UK 1,543 55
India 126 3
This is the current scenario of the countries suffering from Coronavirus. Terrific! Isn’t it?

Symptoms

WHO has stated that the signs of infection (caused by corona) include fever, cough, and shortness of breath and breathing difficulties. In its worst form, it can lead one to pneumonia, multiple organ failure, even death. Doctors and scientists have observed that the current incubation period (the period between the infection and the onset of symptoms is 14 days. In most cases, people showed the symptoms within five to six days. In some cases, patients are showing no symptoms while they have the virus in their system.

Treatment

Unfortunately, scientists haven’t found any proven treatment yet. In multiple countries, scientists are working hard to find out a proven treatment method.

How to Avoid Corona Virus

The best way to avoid getting afflicted by coronavirus is to follow the same general guidelines that doctors suggest for flu season as the coronavirus spreads the same way. Follow some basic yet important guidelines listed below to fight off corona: • Wash your hands frequently • Don’t touch your face • Maintain a distance of at least six feet from a person who is coughing or sneezing • Refrain yourself from traveling for some days • In the wake of cold, cough, or sneezing, visit a doctor

Sum up

The whole world is under the threat of Coronavirus- a terror to mankind. Let’s make ourselves and our loved ones aware of the symptoms and precautions so that we can defeat our new enemy. Resource: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/03/17/world/coronavirus-update-latest-news.html
metaTitle: Facts You Must Know About the COVID-19 Pandemic
metaDescription: The whole world is fighting COVID-19 pandemic. It has already taken away the lives of several individuals of all age groups in multiple countries.

title: COVID-19 and India- A Land of 133.92 Crores
author: Uniterrene
content:
“April is the cruelest month”-T.S Eliot

We couldn’t agree with Eliot more. Mother earth is deeply wounded by the demon called COVID-19. Eliot wrote this famous line in his poem “The Wasteland” in the context of World War II. BBC has reported recently that Antonio Guterres, UN Secretary-General, has defined the outbreak of Corona as the biggest global challenge since World War II. He further warned that Corona could cause a recession “that probably has no parallel in the recent past”. According to the statistics given by the World Health Organization, worldwide 1,174,855 people have been identified as Corona affected till 6th April 2020; 64,471 people across the world have died; 209 countries, areas or territories are suffering from Corona. Let’s have a look at the condition of some most influential countries across the globe: [wptb id=1984] The statistics have been taken from Wikipedia. How Is India Coping with Corona? Considering the suggestion of WHO, entire India is going through the phase of lockdown; only emergency services are available. Every day, the number of Corona affected people is climbing up. People are not getting enough food, groceries, and staples in the market while home delivery services have become entirely exhausted due to heavy demand. Patients having other health issues than Corona are not able to visit health clinics or hospitals in fear of corona. Moreover, Corona is all set to affect India’s economic growth. Multiple sectors including manufacturing, oil, financial, travel, transport, etc are suffering badly. If this is the current scenario, what future is waiting for India? Due to the global crisis and reduced business requirements, the level of employment in multiple Indian service sectors will fall as the firms will be compelled to cut the workforce number for keeping the operating costs tight. Hence, it is clear that we are yet to witness the worse. The only way of keeping businesses alive is online marketing. Businesses should focus on website development, design, and marketing to keep their existence and reach a mass target audience. All these services can be delivered by a reputed website design company. How can we Avoid COVID-19? Now no vaccine is ready for preventing COVID-19. We need to avoid being exposed to this virus to prevent Corona. It can spread mainly from person-to-person. A Corona-affected person can spread it to the people who are in close contact with one another (within about 6 feet). It spreads through respiratory droplets coming out of coughs or sneezes of an infected person. These droplets tend to land in the mouths or noses of nearby people or get inhaled into the lungs. Some studies have shown that COVID-19 can be spread by people who are not showing any predictable signs. To learn some healthy practices that can help you avoid corona, check out this infographic: Even in this darkness, we should expect a ray of hope. Remember those words written by P.B Shelley, “If winter comes, can spring be far behind”? The same way this gloomy darkness will end and we will be blessed with a new life once again. Team Uniterrene is always there with you. Let’s maintain social distancing and hygiene to fight against the monster named COVID-19

title: 7 Facts to Understand the Need for Affordable SEO Services
author: Uniterrene
content:
Search engine optimization or SEO can influence your strategies to reach the targeted audience online. It is an approach of enhancing your site’s visibility in the search engine results of popular search engines such as Google, Yahoo, and Bing.

Regardless of what your business offers, SEO techniques help you improve the site’s overall ranking. Of course, it requires expertise in understanding the current trends by identifying the keywords and phrases specific to the targeted audience based on your business. Hiring affordable SEO services of a well-established firm can make things simple. Before picking a firm, let’s take an in-depth look at the optimization process in the next section.

What Does Search Engine Optimization Mean?

It is a combination of different strategies that help your website to get listed on the first page of the search engine results. Eventually, you can notice it gaining the peak position. In this way, users could reach your business while they are searching for it online.

This process usually starts with keyword research to find out the most-searched phrases specific to your business. Now, you must incorporate those keywords in a natural way to your content. Once you publish and promote these contents, it makes your way to reach the targeted audience. It could be done in two specific ways i.e., On-Page SEO and Off-Page SEO.

Here On-Page SEO refers to the strategies applied to the website itself for enhancing the searchability of the website. It must highlight your best features keeping in mind the targeted keywords. Considering Off-Page SEO refers to the strategies applied for bettering search response from outside the site. However, it aims at targeted users to reach your business online. In this context, hiring a professional service provider makes the process uncomplicated.

Reasons Why You Must Opt for SEO Optimization

For gaining in-depth knowledge of optimization process, here we will discuss some important reasons to find out why business websites need search engine optimization.

1. Sites Get Organic Ranking

On search result pages, you can find paid advertisements when you search using a specific keyword. If you want to reach the top position of search engine results naturally, the search engine optimization process can predominantly do the same.

2. Attracts More Traffic

No doubt, the purpose of getting a website is to reach the targeted audience. With an optimized site, you can earn high rankings to attract the users. However, it is important to have good-quality content to engage them in the site.

3. Improves Traffic Conversions

Whether it is about On-Page or Off-Page SEO, you must publish plagiarism-free and business-related content. It allows the users to stay on the site and helps improve the ranking further. It also brings more users that gradually increase the traffic conversation.

4. Betters User Experience

Quality SEO optimization offers users the type of information that they are actually searching for on the web. If they get what they are looking for easily, it relates to positive user experiences. It becomes one of the elements of your site’s success.

5. Builds Trust and Credibility

Not to mention, you have to build a strong foundation for your website. It must be easily discoverable, clean, and authoritative. This is going to build trust and credibility in the digital world. Affordable SEO services of experts can help you in establishing the same.

6. Long-term Strategy

For business owners, it is important to note that optimization is a long-term strategy. By using practical techniques, you can build your brand online. However, it requires a decent time to better a website by employing best practices for search engine optimization.

7.Cost-effective Solution

When compared to paid results, it is a cost-effective solution. Although SEO doesn’t offer you the process for calculating the ROI, you can track your improvement using website analytics and other techniques. It can also bring new opportunities to help your business online.

Final Words

Implementing optimization techniques can be complex without the right knowledge of the current trends. Experts also ask business owners to keep patience for achieving the desired results. If you are searching for affordable SEO services online, the UniTerrene team can help you improve the site’s visibility and boost credibility using proven techniques.

So, what are you thinking about? Reach UniTerrene and employ SEO tactics to get organic ranking for your business growth! It is the ideal way of accomplishing your marketing goals.

title: Why Must You Hire a Digital Marketing Company? – Let’s Find Out

title: How Does Social Media Optimization Company Help Business Owners?

content:
Social media optimization or SMO is the process of using social media platforms for managing the online presence of a firm. It is a digital marketing strategy that helps increase brand awareness in the market. It also helps business owners connect with potential customers. It can be done using an in-house team; however, hiring a professional social media optimization company can help you strategize the approach successfully.

Suppose you ignore the marketing campaign using social media networks, it could be difficult to maximize the reach online. According to the survey, an estimated 2.95 billion users were using social media platforms worldwide in 2019. It could easily reach 3.43 billion (approx.) in 2023.

Some of the popular platforms include Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, Snapchat, and Pinterest. It helps you generate more leads. SMO is also beneficial for strengthening your brand. That’s why you must opt for specialized services to observe better results.

Is SMO Really Important?

Of course! You must optimize your social media business profiles using practical techniques when you would like to get 100 comments and shares of a post. It may not be directly linked to boosting the rank of the site on search engine results. It must be done along with SMM (social media marketing) and SEO (search engine optimization) to succeed.

How to Start with SMO?

The processes of SEO and SMO aren’t the same. It could have a few things in common for reaching the targeted audience. It includes-

• Making a Proper Plan

A lack of a plan can restrict your reach. Experts know the current market trends very well to make a concrete plan. It starts with identifying clearly defined objectives for the business. The strategy must be focused on achieving measurable results by growing the firms’ presence online. It includes identifying business opportunities and creating engaging content.

Optimising can only be achieved if you do keyword research for determining the phrases specific to the business. It helps you create relevant content using those keywords. No doubt, it is similar to the SEO optimization process. For social media optimization, you must learn the use of hashtags and phrases specific to social media posts for generating content.

• Optimizing Content

According to experts, ‘Content is King’ when you want to optimize the site for search engines. In the case of SMO, it has a similar value. You can’t succeed if you won’t publish good-quality content for a social media marketing campaign. Did you know? Optimizing your social media profile is imperative to help users reach your website. Bottom Line

Today, you can’t succeed just with a business website. When you aim at reaching the targeted audience, you must rely on the professional service of a reliable social media optimizing company. The knowledge and experience of experts help you create your identity online.

title: Google May 2020 Core Update: A Brief Overview
author: Uniterrene
content: Google Search Liaison has recently introduced a broad core algorithm update. It is called “May 2020 Core Update”. What does it state? Google said, “Several times a year, we make significant, broad changes to our search algorithms and systems. We refer to these as “core updates.” They’re designed to ensure that overall; we’re delivering on our mission to present relevant and authoritative content to searchers. These core updates may also affect Google Discover. We confirm broad core updates because they typically produce some widely notable effects. Some sites may note drops or gains during them. We know those with sites that experience drops will be looking for a fix, and we want to ensure they don’t try to fix the wrong things. Moreover, there might not be anything to fix at all.” The May Update is the first core update since the outbreak of COVID-19. Earlier, Google released core updates in 2020, January. This January Update affected some specific content verticals including: Health Family and Community Beauty and Personal Care Finance Internet and Telecom Vehicles Law and Government Websites, which fall into these categories experienced terrible SEO flux due to this update. Heath was exposed to the largest flux. Even though anecdotal, these websites may be more affected by the subsequent updates. Let’s look back at the past. The Medic update (released in 2018) also had a terrific impact on websites of YMYL (Your Money, Your Life) categories. It was designed for weeding out the sites having low authority content that could have severe impacts on someone’s wellbeing. Now, let’s find out what the latest updates will bring to the website. The changes from the May 2020 core updates are introduced to address the Pandemic called Coronavirus. During this pandemic, the most popular searches are related to Coronavirus. Google Search Liaison focused on the local news stories that appear with the top stories on Google Search. What is Google Trying to Define as Local News? “Local news can be material produced by publishers like local newspapers, that we understand specifically serve particular cities or regions. It can also be content we identify as relevant to a particular area, even if written by those outside the area.” —Google Coronavirus has changed how individuals are looking for. This is likely why Google fused these progressions to the "top stories" merry go round. Besides, Google needs to guarantee neighborhood news doesn't get covered down underneath bigger national outlets providing details regarding similar subjects. Does the May 2020 Core Update influence search rankings? Indeed. The underlying information shows that some bigger distributers have encountered extreme changes to certain points of arrival traffic and rankings. We aren't sure why Google is trying outcomes on the SERP during this center update. Be that as it may, a ton of enormous distributors with elevated levels of power have encountered major motions in their rush hour gridlock and rankings. The most probable end is that looking through practices has been changing so quickly due to Coronavirus patterns. To battle this, Google is trying a wide exhibit of indexed lists to gain from the information however much as could reasonably be expected. However, this can demonstrate a major issue to long-lasting distributors that have endeavored to develop their traffic and site authority. What should be done? Update Content One thing to note is the point at which we are ascertaining natural inquiry traffic gauges; we take a gander at the normal month to month volume of a catchphrase just as navigate rates dependent on the positioning. So occasions, for example, May 1, which is Labor Day for the vast majority of the world, didn't slant the outcomes. Presently, to explain, we are not looking at creating new substances on a day by day or even week after week premise. They are continually refreshing their old substance. Once more, there is no "rubric" on the most proficient method to refresh your old substance as it fluctuates per article, however, the key is to take the necessary steps to keep it applicable for your perusers and guarantee that it is superior to the opposition. If you despite everything need some direction on refreshing old substance, here is what we do at Uniterrene: If the substance is not, at this point pertinent to perusers, either erases the page and 301 divert it to the most significant URL on the site or update it to make it important. Are there approaches to make the substance increasingly significant and valuable? For example, would including infographic, bit by bit directions, or recordings to the article make it increasingly helpful? Provided that this is true, include them. Verify whether there are any dead connections and fix them. Dead connections make the poor client experience. If the article is interpreted (I have a major worldwide crowd), ensure the pictures and recordings bode well to anybody perusing the substance in that language. Would you be able to make the article less difficult? Expel cushion and abstain from utilizing complex words that not very many individuals can comprehend. Does the article talk about a particular year or period? If conceivable, make the article evergreen by maintaining a strategic distance from the utilization of dates or explicit time ranges. On the off chance that the article covers particular issues individuals are confronting, ensure you take a gander at Quora first before refreshing the article. Is this article a copy? Not from a wording viewpoint, yet are you practically covering precisely the same idea as another article on your site. Provided that this is true, consider consolidating them and 301 divert one URL to the next. Fix Thin Content Here's another fascinating detail for you. Overall, Ubersuggest slithers 71 sites each moment. Also, when I mean slither, clients are placing in URLs to check for SEO blunders. One mistake that our framework takes a gander at is a slender substance (pages with low-word checks). All things considered, 46% of the sites we dissect have in any event one page that is meager in content. Would you be able to think about what number of those destinations got affected by the most recent calculation update? We need more information on the entirety of the URLs as most of those locales to get next to no hunt traffic as they are either new destinations or haven't done much SEO. However, when we take a gander at the last 400 destinations in our framework that were hailed with dainty substance alerts for pages other than their contact page, about page, or landing page, and had at any rate 1,000 guests every month from Google, they saw a gigantic move in rankings. You should fix the pages that might be more inside and out. Here are the three primary inquiries to consider when fixing flimsy substance pages: Do you truly need to include more words – on the off chance that you can get the message across in a couple of hundred words or through pictures or recordings, it might be sufficient. Try not to include words when it isn't required. Think about the client experience. Individuals would prefer to have the solution to their inquiry shortly than to hold up minutes. How does your page contrast with the opposition – take a gander at comparable pages that are positioning on page 1. Do they have more substance than you or less? This will give you a thought on the off chance that you have to grow your page, particularly if every individual who positions on page 1 has, at any rate, a couple of thousand words on their page. Does it at any point bode well to keep the page – on the off chance that it gives next to zero an incentive to a consumer and you can't improve it by refreshing it, you might need to consider erasing it and 301 divert the URL to another comparative page on your site. Fix your SEO mistakes Another fascinating finding that we saw when burrowing through our Ubersuggest information is that locales with more SEO blunders got affected extraordinarily. Presently, this doesn't imply that if you have a huge amount of SEO blunders you can't rank or you will get hit by a calculation update. All the more so it was one sort of blunder that hurt locales more than others. It was destinations with copy title labels and meta-tags. One thing to note was that numerous destinations have copy meta-labels, yet when an enormous part of your pages has copy meta-labels, it, as a rule, makes issues. So we uncovered locales that contained copy meta-labels and title labels for 20% or a greater amount of their pages. The vast majority of these locales didn't get a lot of traffic when all is said in done, yet for the 363 that we could uncover that produced at any rate 1,000 visits every month from Google, 151 saw a diminishing in rush hour gridlock by in any event 10%. So, this is high time you should implement the tips given above to cope with the impacts of these latest updates.

title: Where is Corona Impact Taking the Indian IT Industry?
author: Uniterrene
content:
“If winter comes, can spring be far behind?”- P. B Shelley

Perhaps, the Indian IT industry is spending every day with this hope that just like winter and spring, a promising future will come soon after the end of the pandemic called COVID-19. The flare-up of COVID-19 has brutally impacted the global economy. Businesses, across multiple sectors around the world, have already been exhausted. Let’s have a look at how pathetically the global stock market is running:

IMAGE SOURCE: https://www.bbc.com/news/business-51706225

The outbreak of the virus has compelled maximum countries to enforce complete lockdown. As an outcome, the fear of a terrible recession is brooding over several industries including the IT industry. As the virus has affected the first-world countries mercilessly, its impact in India is comparatively lower.

But wait a while! It’s not a sign of relief for the Indian IT industry. Though the number of Indians affected by COVID-19 is less than in other progressive countries till now, it is not at all kind to the IT sector.

Around 55% of electronics India imports from China. Due to running lockdown, all the international flights have been suspended. It reduces the percentage from 55 to 40. It is known to all that the IT industry has been the backbone of Indian over the last few decades. It plays a remarkable role in supporting middle-class working people.

Industry experts have predicted that the COVID-19 pandemic will cause a slowdown in the growth during this financial year. In April, The Economic Times reported that India’s top software exporters, Tata Consultancy Services, Infosys, and HCL Technologies will be the worst victim of the reduced spending by the US and Europe-based clients.

While this is the scenario of Indian IT giants, how small IT firms and start-ups are doing now? The answer is simple. While big ships are sinking, how can small boats survive? Small and mid-level companies are trapped in India. Most SMEs depend on outsourcing. American, European, and other foreign countries outsource IT services from small and mid-level Indian firms. These companies offer several IT services including affordable websites, mobile app, and other kinds of software development services.

Since the economy of the first-world countries is standing on the verge of collapse, gaining new projects is nothing but a dream for Indian IT firms. Moreover, the running projects may come to a close; payments may become uncertain. In such circumstances, most companies will be unable to provide salaries to their employees. As an outcome, a huge employee laid off is breathing down our neck.

Indian IT firms will find even a more terrific challenge when the companies will renegotiate the existing contracts and try to grapple growth initiatives and discretionary. In recent days, several Indian firms have faced multiple project cancellations by their clients due to the bindings in air travel and shutting down of cities and countries for breaking the chain of Coronavirus.

A report has revealed, "Though management of IT companies has restrained to quantify the potential impact of the COVID-19 breakout on the financials, there has been a disruption in service delivery and execution due to travel restrictions, client's confidentiality clauses, and work-from-home (WFH) advisories since mid-March”

Bottom Line

From the above discussion, the current state of the Indian IT industry is lucid. Still, we should not forget Shelley’s optimistic line, “if winter comes, can spring be far behind?” Everything is destined to have an ending. One day, the mother Earth will come out of the grip of the virus. The human race will again get the flow of living back. Gradually, the economy will also regain its previous stature. When the economy will regain its strength, the IT industry will get oxygen once again.

Also Read: COVID-19 and India- A Land of 133.92 Crores
metaTitle: Where is the Indian IT Industry Standing Now?

Find a reliable web design company for creating an amazing site. Interestingly, they consider all aspects of making a site appropriate for search engines as well as customers. It helps you acquire a considerable amount of traffic. Since professional website designers employ practical and proven methods to make a site load faster, it helps in getting a competitive edge on the web. In simple words, page speed is essential for enhanced user experience. Suppose your design is stunning and your content is of high-quality, it may not be the effective elements until you don’t decrease the loading time. Let’s discuss the tactics used for increasing web page speed-
  • Minify Codes
Minify CSS, HTML, and JavaScript for optimizing the codes that include removing unnecessary spaces, characters, and commas. It is also essential to remove unused codes, comments, and formatting for optimization. It can significantly increase the page speed.
  • Enable Compression
In many cases, the file size of CSS, JavaScript, and HTML increases up to 150 bytes and beyond. Compressing these files can put an impact on page loading time. Professionals use specific tools for compressing them to have better control over compressing parameters.
  • Optimize Image Sizes
Experts never compress image size unnecessarily or else it could affect the quality. For optimizing images, web designers utilize CSS sprites and create a template. It not only reduces the size of those images but also retains the quality of the same.
  • Leverage Browser Caching
Cache stores data so that users could visit that site faster the very next time. It is possible to set a cache expiration date specific to each site on the web. A professional web design company gives importance to leverage browser caching for faster website loading speed.
  • Reduce Redirects
While visiting a page, visitors have to wait because of redirect requests. There is no need for multiple redirects because it could slow down the page loading speed. It is always best to optimize the redirect patterns such that you could save the valuable time of your visitors.
  • Use CDNs
CDN or Content Delivery Network is a system of distributed servers. It helps in getting webpages and content specific to the geographic locations of the users. It enables them to access to a faster server nearby to ensure a faster loading time of the web pages. Why Should You Care About Website Loading Time? As already discussed, the page speed decides whether the visitors would stay on your site. If you ignore this essential parameter while building a site, you may find it difficult to achieve your business goals. According to reports, users hardly wait for 5 seconds while visiting a site on the web. These sites are likely to lose visitors and get a low rank in the search engine results. The most preferred loading time is 3-second and below. It can attract visitors to explore the site in the search for their respective products and/or services. With this kind of approach, you can acquire better page views and improved traffic. Now, you just need to keep a check on the quality of content such that you could engage the visitors and transform them into customers. The professionals of top-rated Web Design Company say that a 1 second delay in page load time can decrease the page views up to 11%. It can also put an impact on customer satisfaction by 15% – 20% and you are likely to lose conversion rates by 7%. Unfortunately, you could notice a significant change in the above-mentioned statistics if your content quality is poor. Did you know? Low page speed can also lead to site crash if users work on a slow internet connection. For e-commerce sites, it could potentially cost them money every second. Reports suggest that a loading time of 2-second can increase the conversion rate by 70% and above. How to Test Website Speed? Fortunately, website owners can check the site speed by utilizing tools online. No matter whether you have an old or a new website, you must give importance to site speed. The poor loading time of the site can divert your existing customers and restrict the new customers from reaching you on the web. That’s why you must keep a check on the site speed occasionally. Some of the free tools for verifying the website loading site include GTmetrix, Pingdom, and Google PageSpeed. Other than these tools, you can also opt for Gomez and Web Page Test. Final Thoughts Are you smart enough to increase the page speed? For starters, web content is not just a factor of acquiring visitors. There are several elements including website loading time that help you make your new site attractive for the users. A professional web design company also utilize Google Web Light tool to make a site ready for a slow internet connection. It reduces the image counts and texts to display specific information related to the site. The best thing is that top companies never settle for a single tool. Start with finding a reliable designer and share your requirements. First of all, experts will analyze everything to ensure top-notch services. Thus, you can optimize your site and content to get a better rank online. Get in touch with the team of UniTerrene Websoft today. It has qualified and talented web designers for creating your dreamed site within a specified time. It also has a professional team of web developers, SEO experts, and digital marketing experts who help in building a site attractive for search engines. Hurry up and check out the services offered before you hire! Increased site loading time and improved user experience can impact your business profits!

title: 5 Top SEO Techniques that Help Drive Organic Traffic
author: Uniterrene
content:

5 SEO Techniques to Drive Traffic to Your Site

1. Improve User Experience

Poor quality sites won’t get a better rank because search engines utilize algorithms to filter the high-quality websites based on several factors for improving the user experience. Some of the crucial factors include direct website visits, time spent on the site, bounce rate, pages per session, and referring domains. To make things effective, experts develop relevant content.

2. Design for Mobile Devices

Today, you can find a greater count of mobile users across the globe. It helps you reach the targeted audience with ease. If your site is SEO-friendly, it makes the process for the users to visit your site and explore the same. The most preferred sites include e-commerce websites for shoppers. If you can improve your mobile experience, you can definitely get more traffic.

3. Refresh Existing Content

Do you have an existing site? That’s great! It can minimize the time required for optimizing a site. First of all, experts go through the homepage content as well as other web pages to identify the quality of the same. It includes grammatical errors, spelling mistakes, and plagiarism. If there is a need for change, they will ask you to refresh the content with a high-quality one.

4. Optimise for Voice Search

With the advancement in AI (Artificial Intelligence), the voice search process has been increasingly used all over the world. Not only adults but other users also prefer voice search to reduce a fraction of seconds while searching for anything on the web. By using a competent optimizing strategy, an agency can help you make a big difference in your site.

5. Target Local Searchers

Depending on the business type, you must target your audience. The best way to reach them is by targeting them locally because users often look for nearby shops. They always look for details such as opening hours, telephone numbers, and addresses so that they could contact you as per their convenience. It helps you capture potential customers directly.

Final Thoughts

title: How Can the Best Web Design Company Help Your Business Online?
author: Uniterrene
content:
Today, you can observe that the website traffic has been diverted to mobile users when compared to other methods. It is because of the rise in mobile devices used across the globe.

According to reports, 5.15 billion individuals use at least one mobile in the world. It is likely to increase in the next few months and beyond. This ever-increasing number of mobile users worldwide leads to the advancement in technology including the development of responsive websites. In this context, you must hire the best web design company to get expert services.

The mobile-friendly sites can help you easily reach the peak position in the SERPs. It has the potential to boost your profit generation by increasing business leads. Did you know? Websites that are not designed for mobile devices are likely to get limited traffic. Thus, it reduces the organic ranking in the search engine results. It can affect your sales and branding as well.

It tells that responsive website design is important. It can also be considered as a popular web development trend. It helps in creating an effective mobile experience.

What Is Responsive Site Design? – Explained

It is a type of website that comes with a flexible layout. It enables the site to adjust to any screen size. Irrespective of the device you use, the site is likely to adjust the screen size to view the content visually appealing and to-the-point. The main aim of designing a responsive site is to attract different users from all over the world to reach your business seamlessly. In other words, there will be no need for manually resizing the site to view content.

When you implement SEO strategies and other important techniques to the site, it improves user experience as well. It can contribute to your site ranking in the SERPs. If you consider hiring the best web design company, you can rely on the expert services to get desired outcomes.

Techniques that Make a Site Responsive Online

Several methods are used to develop a site as per the current trend. One of those methods is implementing buttons to ensure quick navigation. Experts also consider SVGs (Scalable Vector Graphic) files that help in shaping the image content maintaining the image quality. The font size also plays an important role in making a site attractive to the users. Upon implementing all the necessary features for the site design, the final step is the test. Once you test the site, it helps you determine whether you have done with the project or not. Did you know? You can find mobile templates to build websites. However, it is not possible to make templates responsive because they are not meant for adjusting as per the screen size.

So, you must determine your needs before finding the best web design company. If you need an isolated mobile website, you must ask for a similar kind of services. Or else, you have to ask experts for developing a site by adopting the responsive site design methods.

Some Important Benefits of Creating a Responsive Site

• Better Site SEO

Although you are developing a site responsive, it links to bettering the site SEO. As Google takes the responsiveness of the websites into account to rank a site, it helps you get a higher rank in the organic search results. With time, you can reach the peak position to gain more customers.

• Faster Page Loading Time

According to reports, the loading time of a page can attract visitors to the site. If a website loading time is high, it is likely to have high bounce rates. It restricts visitors from availing of your products/services. In this context, responsive site design helps you improve the same.

• Higher Conversation Rates

Once you could improve the loading time of the site, you are likely to get hold of more visitors to the site. Now, the quality of the content plays a big role in engaging them to your site. It is directly linked to transforming them into loyal customers. It increases conversion rates.

• Improved User Experience

As a website owner, you must give importance to the experience of the users. It makes sure that users stay on the site and explore the same by spending much time. It is possible because they find it easy to navigate without the need for zooming content.

• Simpler Website Analytics

Experts give importance to improving a site periodically to attract visitors. It also becomes a way of interacting with them digitally. With a responsive site, you just need to develop a single site version for different devices. It eases the process of improving a site with simpler analytics.

• Rapid Web Development

Initially, it was essential to develop different web versions of the same site for a specific type of users online. It requires time to complete the project and it also incurs additional cost. With a single version of website development, it quickens the process and reduces the cost as well.

Other Benefits

Fortunately, the benefits of responsive site development are not limited. It offers many other advantages too. Suppose you have to develop two versions of the same site, you have to generate unique content for each site. In case you ignore this process and utilise the same content for all versions of the site, it creates duplicate content. It can lead to lower site rank. Search engines can also penalise sites with duplicate content if adequate steps won’t be taken.

Once you prefer designing a responsive site, there is no possibility of developing duplicate content. You can also start campaigning for your business products/services with ease. In simple words, you can utilise your capital in a far better way to attract customers to your site.

Another benefit is that you could maintain your site with ease. As experts of the best web design company have to work on a single site, they consider all aspects of developing it attract for the search engines. It helps them manage time and resources adequately to focus on important things that lead to further growth of your business online.

Final Thoughts

Nowadays, you can find individuals prefer using smartphones and tablets because they are on-the-go devices. If you could develop a site for mobile users, you’ll get increased traffic.

Although some business owners still prefer developing two versions of a site, it is a time-consuming process. It also requires high maintenance charges. Rather than developing two separate versions of the same site, it is best to build a responsive website. Once developed, it is ready for all types of devices. This ensures that you could get hold of mobile users along with other users to help them avail of your services online.

To make things effective, you must hire the best web design company like Uniterrene Websoft in India. As it has a professional team of web designers and developers, it helps you build your preferred business site. Just visit the official page, share your requirements today, and get a quote. Before finalizing the project, feel free to get details from other service providers in the market. Thereafter, you find that Uniterrene asks affordable web development charges.

title: 10 Newest Features to Know for Developing a Phenomenal Mobile App
author: Uniterrene
content:
“Mobile is becoming not only the new digital hub, but also the bridge to the physical world. That’s why mobile will affect more than just your digital operations — it will transform your entire business.” - Thomas Husson, Vice President and Principal Analyst at Forrester Research

With that in mind, it has become imperative for every business to create a highly interactive mobile app for connecting with the ever-expanding mobile-driven audience. Continual research and analysis have led companies to come up with more useful features as they are on the constant quest of upgrading the user experience.

Newer technologies like augmented reality, Artificial Intelligence (AI), machine learning and data science are deployed nowadays to introduce more powerful features which, are helping businesses to fulfil their customer expectations. So, before you join hands with a top-rated app development company in India, let us have a detailed overview on the inherent features of a latest mobile application.

Great performance in terms of usability

A good mobile app must be informative, innovative and at the same time, easy to navigate. By focussing on developing a simple and interactive app design, you can delight your users with an impressive experience altogether. This further ensures that they will come back next time and recommend your app to their friends and peers as well. If it performs well on a consistent level, then the chances for the app to become a hit in the market also increase.

Advanced analytics

Implementing the analytics feature is another requisite which you need to have an in-depth understanding of user behaviour by keeping proper track of their activities while using the app and evaluating the same. This extensive analysis will also help in planning a winning marketing strategy which, will aid in benefitting your business by improving the user experience altogether.

Integration of Machine Learning and Data Science

Both of these pathbreaking technologies including Data Science and Machine Learning have already made its way to different dimensions of business. Likewise, the talented mobile app developers of recent times have came up with possible ways of integrating them into mobile application development for making the apps more interactive, responsive and feature rich.

Integration of social media

Social media integration is a popular attribute inculcated by businesses in their enterprise mobile apps for staying connected with their digital customers. It majorly focusses on simplifying the sign up process by using the social media channels to retrieve information and share different posts as well so that users stay engaged while operating the app.

Integration of Augmented Reality

Infusing this highly innovative technology into the dynamics of your mobile application will further improve the user experience in multiple ways. By doing so, you can introduce the ‘to try before buy’ option for customers. This model typically offers the scope to try new goods or items on the basis of users’ characteristics for increasing the ability of customers to make a well-informed purchase. AR integration actually helps app makers to deliver something exciting and interactive by going beyond reality.

Coverage of cross platforms

While considering the task of mobile app development, you need to focus on one of the two options or both of them simultaneously – Android and iOS. However, a third option, widely known as cross-platform app development frameworks that offer a superior quality native performance along with code sharing. As a cost-saving solution, they greatly help businesses in ensuring their apps achieve early market entry.

Extensive data security

High-end security is a top priority to develop a successful mobile app. Efficient data confidentiality and security capabilities are an important aspect that determines its user acceptance after being launched in Google Play or Apple App Store. Keeping the data secure and private also helps in enhancing your app’s trust factor.

Integration of payment gateways

To carry on your transactions including accepting payments from users, it is of utmost importance to have a highly secured, well-integrated payment gateway with your mobile application. This attribute is used for checking user information thoroughly to ensure that they succeed in making an appropriate payment for the product or service availed by them.

Google Indoor maps

As a trending feature these days, it allows the user to navigate through the indoor locations including libraries, sports avenues, malls and museums. The Google Indoor maps attribute is helpful for identifying the shortest route of reaching to a specific store within the mall or finding the nearest coffee shops and restaurants.

Integration of OR/Barcode Scanner

Regarded as another advantageous attribute, it helps users to land on to your application by using a super convenient way. The QR code is being framed and scanned to redirect the users to the page of an item detail thereby, helping them in saving their valuable time. This in turn, assists you in providing a world class experience and improving final conversions to a substantial extent.

Considering mobile as the future of business, organizations are trying to reshape their marketing strategies to make it more mobile-driven for increasing their sales potential. As the need of the hour, you must consult a distinguished app development company in India for developing a winning app that helps you expand your customer reach. As your ideal choice, Uniterrene Websoft Pvt Ltd has earned wide reputation for having a team of extremely talented app developers who holds an enviable track record of developing highly intuitive mobile applications for businesses across varied industry verticals.

Hope you’ve got ample information on mobile app development and it was completely worth a read. For more updates and news on these technological advances, stay tuned to our blog section.
